article_title: Hackers Demand Sony Kills 'The Interview', Ex-Employees Demand Disclosure

article_metadata.author: Thomas Fox-Brewster

og.description: As Sony hackers release more information on execs, the Guardians of Peace crew demands a "terrorist" film, most likely 'The Interview', be stopped. Meanwhile, one ex-worker has demanded the resignations of senior Sony Pictures staff.
og.title: Hackers Demand Sony Kills 'The Interview', Ex-Employees Demand Disclosure
